definition: plural marker for pronouns, and nouns referring to individuals

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
we or us (including both the speaker and the person(s) spoken to)/(dialect) I or me/(dialect) (in a coaxing or familiar way) you/also pr. [za2 men5]
erhua variant of 哥們|哥们[ge1 men5]
menfolk (collective term for men of different generations)/husbands and their fathers etc
erhua variant of 爺們|爷们[ye2 men5]
Tumen county level city in Yanbian Korean autonomous prefecture 延邊朝鮮族自治州|延边朝鲜族自治州, Jilin
Tumen river in Jilin province 吉林省, forming the eastern border between China and North Korea
Tumen county level city in Yanbian Korean autonomous prefecture 延邊朝鮮族自治州|延边朝鲜族自治州, Jilin

sentences.english: We were kept on tenterhooks for hours while the judges chose the winner.
sentences.chinese: 我们坐立不安了好几个小时，等着裁判们决定获胜者。

sentences.english: The children are playing under the tree.
The crowd was disappointed about the lack of enthusiam from the players.
sentences.chinese: 一些缺乏激情的选手们令观众大失所望。

sentences.english: However, the moonlit glare washes this rather faint constellation from the sky tonight.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，月光洗去了今晚天际中星星们昏暗的光。

sentences.english: So in the interest of helping out the next generation of thieves, I'm going to offer you a few pointers.
sentences.chinese: 所以，为了有助于下一代游荡者们，我准备教你几招。

sentences.english: The boys are seen with some style changes and dramatic smoky eye make up.
sentences.chinese: 男孩们看起来造型有了些变化，而且还化了烟熏妆。

sentences.english: Can the technetium view of the outside let E people emotional desalt Ma?
sentences.chinese: 外界的锝说法会让莪们的感情淡化唛？

sentences.english: Scientists don't yet know what the effects of those reactions might be.
sentences.chinese: 科学家们还不清楚这些反应会具体产生什么样的结果。

sentences.english: The travellers were dismayed to find the bridge had been wash away.
sentences.chinese: 旅行者们发现桥被冲跑了，很沮丧。

sentences.english: My acquaintance confirmed that his fellow postmen were neither terribly nice nor terribly nasty.
sentences.chinese: 我这位熟人证明，他的同事们既不太好，也不太差。

sentences.english: Satan and the rebel angels have been roundly defeated.
sentences.chinese: 撒旦和叛乱天使们被彻底击败了。

sentences.english: There was a roar of anger from his fellows: Scabior drew his wand.
sentences.chinese: 他的同伙们怒吼起来，斯卡比奥拔出魔杖。

sentences.english: IN 1887 physicists were feeling pretty smug about their subject.
sentences.chinese: 1887年物理学家们对自己的学科都颇为自鸣得意。

sentences.english: You shouldn't force food on children.
sentences.chinese: 你不应该强迫孩子们吃东西。

sentences.english: I love to meet up with my friends, get out of the city.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢和朋友们聚在一起，离开城市的喧嚣。

sentences.english: Scientists find that hard-working people live longer than average men and women.
sentences.chinese: 科学家们发现努力工作的人比一般的人更有生活。

definition: of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
all/both/entirely/(used for emphasis) even/already/(not) at all
to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
to/for/for the benefit of/to give/to allow/to do sth (for sb)/(grammatical equivalent of 被)/(grammatical equivalent of 把)/(sentence intensifier)
one after another/in succession/one by one/continuously/diverse/in profusion/numerous and confused/pell-mell
